mapper.select: SELECT wah.id id, wah.type type, wah.content content, wah.create_time createTime, wah.begin_date beginDate, wah.end_date endDate, sda1.name typeName, sda2.name statusName, sda3.name resultName, su.account createUserAccount, su.name createUserName FROM t_work_apply_holiday wah -- 假期类型名称 LEFT JOIN t_sys_dictionary sda1 ON sda1.code = wah.type AND sda1.type_code = #{holidayType} -- 申请状态名称 LEFT JOIN t_sys_dictionary sda2 ON sda2.code = wah.status AND sda2.type_code = #{applyStatusType} -- 申请结果名称 LEFT JOIN t_sys_dictionary sda3 ON sda3.code = wah.result AND sda3.type_code = #{applyResultType} LEFT JOIN t_sys_user su ON su.id = wah.create_user WHERE wah.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_work_apply_holiday (id, type, begin_date, end_date, content, create_user, create_time) VALUES (null, #{type}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{content}, #{createUser}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_work_apply_holiday SET type = #{type}, begin_date = #{beginDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, content = #{content}, modify_time = #{modifyTime} WHERE id = #{id}
